lenders.name: Saras Vision (An AMC)
lenders.loan_because:
Sohail Khan
Founder Chairman & Managing Director
International Certified Financial Consultants
Saras Vision (An Asset Management Company)
Mumbai
India
Website:
www.sarasvision.com
lenders.occupational_info:
International Certified Financial Consultants

We specialize in the below mentioned products;
a) Over Draft Facility in INR Currency
b) Cash Credit Facility in INR Currency
c) Bills Discounting Facility in INR Currency
d) Bank Guarantees Facility in INR / Foreign Currency
e) Term Loan in INR / Foreign Currency
f) Packing Credit Facility (pre-shipment) in INR / Foreign Currency
g) Packing Credit Facility (post-shipment) in Foreign Currency
h) PCFC in Foreign Currency (LIBOR)
i) Factoring - Domestic & Export in INR / Foreign Currency
j) Hedging Services for Foreign Currency
k) Forward Cover for Foreign Currency
l) Letter of Credit (Inland) in INR Currency
m) Letter of Credit (Import / Overseas) in Foreign Currency
o) Equity Funding in INR / Foreign Currency
p) Unsecured EMI Based SME Term Loan in INR Currency (max. INR 500 Lakhs)
q) Purchase Invoice Finance in INR Currency
r) Project Finance in INR / Foreign Currency
s) Bills of Exchange / Private Hundi Finance in INR Currency (Offer limited to Clients situated in Mumbai, India only)
t) Working Capital Limit in INR Currency
u) Line of Credit facility in Foreign Currency
v) Loans against Stocks/Shares in Foreign Currency

lenders.occupational_info:
My job requires me to work on medical research using mathematics and computers.

On occasion, I relax by feeding seagulls dried dog food.  The town I live in is by the ocean and I live on a little island renting a condo.

Beer is always good, too.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: there are people out there who are in more need than I

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because:
We live in a very big world but it is easy to get lost in our tiny personal sphere. Kiva helps me to step out of my day to day struggles and frustrations. Loaning on Kiva helps me to put my world in context and to remind myself how incredibly blessed I am. I loan because it is the very least I can do to express my gratitude for the gifts my life has given to me. 

By stepping outside my town, state, or country's needs on Kiva I feel that I can impact a world that is often hidden from my sight. It reminds me of the importance of helping strangers and spreading the blessings I have been given to those that are in greater need than I will ever experience. 

I loan to be an agent of change in a country that politically and socially has tied many of it's citizens hands. 

I loan because it fills my heart with love and joy in a disjointed world.

I loan to women specifically because, as a strong woman, I feel that it is my duty to support the empowerment and safety of other strong women that are risking life and limb every day just to care for their families. I do not discriminate against men in life or on Kiva but I have made a choice to loan only to women due to that desire.
lenders.occupational_info: I study Behavioral Ecology and Environmental Economics through Prescott College. The goal of my studies is to bring more sustainable results into the world of endangered species population restoration that I find so fascinating.

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: Investments of love, time, labor and money (given in that order) work.
lenders.occupational_info:
I believe I can invest a $15,000 "nest-egg" in the futures market and obtain a return of about $3000 a month. I believe I can double the nest-egg in a year and likewise double the return.

Is it risky?  Yes.  I could easily loose it all in a month.

Why am I doing this?  (1)  I retired early with not quite enough savings to see me through -- I'm short about $2000 a month.  (2) I spent my life (all 62 years of it) wasting time.  I do not want to have on my tombstone the inscription "Here lies a man who did nothing -- God is NOT pleased". (3) So before the sun sets on my life I make a difference in the lives of others by investing in those charities that feed to world's hungry and care for the world's needy.  (4) So I will devote to these charities all the investment earnings not needed to support my modest lifestyle (5) This is 99% about spiritual improvement and 1% about making money.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: "Say NO to terrorism. Start a business!"
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Deputy Sheriff for a small mountain community,as well as, a Soldier for the United States Army National Guard. I have served in Iraq and Afghanistan. I like to hike outdoors and I enjoy Beer in the city with friends.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: Many times in my life I have been helped by the kindness and generosity of strangers.  I am now in a position to give some of that help back to others who are striving for a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who are sad, depressed or afraid to feel better and live happier, healthier lives.

lenders.name: Egil
lenders.loan_because: Was directed to Kiva by a person I respect. After a brief look I registered as lender. I liked the KIVA model very much and believe that being a KIVA lender is a very good way to able people around the world  to strive for  their dreams and be able to "make their own lifes" even if it means hard work. I highly respect people that are willing to make hard efforts to provide for themselves, eventhough the conditions they are living in are very difficult.
lenders.occupational_info:
Working with sales of wood products, used by industries and private people for building projects. 
Using wood for building purposes is also very good for the environment. Trees are collecting CO2 when the grow.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I believe that today will someday be tomorrow and if all of the pieces of today fall into place for someone, then tomorrow will be a better today.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the former coordinator of a project studying the political status of ethnic groups worldwide.

lenders.name: Vicki
lenders.occupation: Account Manager for a transportation logistics co.
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit can make a big difference to someone. I had the opportunity to live in South America for some time and saw firsthand how others live on much less than I do. I respect the entrereneurs on this site, and I'd like to be a part of supporting their businesses. I like connecting with others, and I think this is such an awesome idea.

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a fantastic way to help people help themselves.  Also in memory of my father who I miss very much.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people up instead of telling them to pull themselves up by their own boostraps

lenders.name: Colin
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping those who have the courage to help themselves. I also wish to be an example in reminding others that one doesn't need to belong to a religious group to help those who are in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Although I enjoy giving aide to all types of entrepreneurs, I am especially passionate about the environment and education.

lenders.name: DJ G.
lenders.loan_because: I want to show that young people can make a difference also.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school, but I try to truly educate myself in other ways

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I can.....maybe not much, but I can.

lenders.name: Nelson
lenders.loan_because: I believe in capital investment in the developing worlds and the power of the individual.

lenders.name: Tarky7
lenders.loan_because: We can make a change, even if it is a little at a time.  It all has to do with the attitude.  The current Web gives up the ability to empower ourselves and help others, one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the online social network space. As such, I help clients get found on Google by others who sahre the same interests and passion.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: My nephews provided me a gift certificate, however, I hope to add to the base amount in the future.  My hope is that this investment provides opportunities to others who own small businesses around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: My friend gave me this locksmith company and "taught me to fish".  I provide services to corporate customers such as picking, re-keying or installing locks and other security devices.

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make life a little better for someone else.

lenders.name: Austin
lenders.loan_because: I believe that God has blessed me with the skills that I use to make money. In return, I show my gratitude to God by spending that money wisely, including by helping other people who need financial help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a doctor of Family Medicine. I work with people of all ages who need health care.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I want to help any way I can.

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Seth
lenders.loan_because: I know a little amount of difference can change the world.

lenders.name: khalil
lenders.loan_because: because i am observing that private schools here in area are not providing good quality of education as well as not treating the students well so this is why students are depressed. so i need any body's help that i can build a school where i can provide all required facilities of education and i can make hopeful to the poorer students and i can courage in their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: i am about to 26 years. having degrees MSc (Physiology), B.Ed from university of sindh , jamshoro, Pakistan

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Micro finance makes great sense.  with experience my involvement will grow
lenders.occupational_info: before retirement I was in charge of acquisitions for a large global software company

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.occupational_info: I help create buildings.

lenders.name: Gloria
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everybody should have a chance for a better life and to live their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I make coffee for people. :)

lenders.name: Oleg
lenders.occupational_info: I export cars worldwide to save people in other countries money and provide affordable vehicles.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: All 6 billion of us are in this together. Now reach out and touch somebody. I think each one of us can be the change we want to see in the world.

lenders.name: Jacob
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lenders.name: Khang
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping and giving back to the community.

lenders.name: Nadira
lenders.loan_because:
I want loan because I want to pay my tuition fees..

I have a part time job and I do online investing and its taking me longtime to withdraw thats why I want to take some loan and want to pay my tuitions... When I will get money from my investment I will return it...

lenders.occupational_info: i am network marketeer mlm business

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I am also a small business owner and I want to share

lenders.name: Carl
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to help people to help themselves.  Give a man a fish he eats today, give him a fishing rod he eats every day!
lenders.occupational_info: selling houses and finance to buy houses. Helping clients protect themselves against lifes accidents and illnesses.

lenders.name: Alexandra
lenders.loan_because: Kiva has created a program based on people believing in one another from all over the world. Something that has been deemed naive and unachievable (even foolish) but here it comes true.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Peace Corps Volunteer in Romania. I live in a village and teach English to Romanian students. I am just getting started so I am sure much more is to come.

lenders.name: Daonnan Partners
lenders.loan_because: it is our wish to pay it forward for the wonderful lives with which we have been given.

lenders.name: Sage
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: arik and michelle
lenders.loan_because: we are incredibly blessed!
lenders.occupational_info: We make intentional and creative stuff full of good juju, people buy our stuff instead of other stuff and it allows us to help others prosper. Our mission is that this be a blessing for everyone involved.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: It is exciting and fulfilling to help someone become successful and find their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: University professor and entrepreneur

lenders.name: Pieter
lenders.loan_because: I want to support entrepreneurship and diminish poverty.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people, and in helping people have access to the tools to build a better life for themselves, their families and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: my day job just pays the bills, my real work is helping to bring about an environmentally sustainable, socially just, and spiritually fulfilling human presence on the planet.
